content: Very functional and easy to use app. It has worked flawlessly. Critiques:I would like the energy saver options to be more clear and to be able to dim the led from the app.

Worked great schedules went off without a hitch. Now the schedules simply don't work Edit: The issue is that for over a month the schedules automatically worked without issue. Now the schedules stopped working randoming, after reinstalling the app, they work for a day or two and stop working again. I'm using the in a greenhouse outdoors and my plants are starting to die, have to setup alarms to double check them manually now.

Great app. Didn't connect first attempt, but second time hooked right up. App is so much faster and easier to use than the original remote ( which is not hard to use at all). Great job on creating a seamless union between app and product.

But... I already have & even suggested resources such as geo logging for improvements. You guys just simply quit communicating. Only thing I can recommend now is that you guys actually make an effort to download a user manual for the split units for example, read it & pay attention to things like ambient temperature controls & the follow me settings & then realize that even if the user attempts to sync the remote/app, it fails as the app does not control a remote that is not connected to the app
Had trouble setting up wifi, but helpline from Cielo was excellent. My Mr Cool is now connected and app works good.

It was hard to connect the AC using my Pixel 3a. It helped me to turn on airplane mode, then I could connect to the AC via wifi. I suspect my phone doesn't want to stay connected more than a few seconds if any other internet is available.
I'm sure the condenser can measure the outside temp. it would be nice to see it displayed in the app.

UPDATE: Cielo contacted me immediately to tell me how to delete the schedules (swipe left). I'm adding a star for their quick and helpful response. Also, the latest updates have added an awkward slide out menu which gives additional features. Thanks for that and please overhaul the app. _____________ I've been using the app for about 8 months. It's clumsy, poorly designed, and doesn't give control of all features. I also can't figure out how to delete schedules.

Excellent app and excellent mini-split heat pumps. User-friendly, reliable, and easy to set up the app to our multiple mobile devices. Only missing feature that would be nice to have is the ability to silence the beeps and dim the LED from the app like you can with the remote. Overall 5/5 would download again.
Extremely easy to use and works like a charm! I am in love with automated air conditioning.

Works for me. The Comfy Temperature feature is nice but it should be easier to find. Usually I just use the remote but it is nice to have a way to control the AC when not at home. Customer service was helpful when I didn't understand a feature.
This is a brilliant app. I have officially entered the world of Smartness. Thanks MrCool!

I love the features. However, I would love for the display to be able to be turned off on a schedule. even at it's lowest setting, it is still bright in a completely dark bedroom. This would be really nice.
Greetings,. I have both the Turbo Cool and function on my Mini split. The latest update log said I would have access to those features to the app.
Excellent customer service! My unit wasn't working and the support team helped me. Works great, very good experience so far. Thank you!

The app is fairly easy to use but that doesn't matter because the mini split logic doesn't work properly. You set any other AC to cool and once the desired temp is reached the compressor and possibly the fan shut off until it gets warm again, then the AC kicks back on. I turn this one to a set temp and it's still cooling when it's 20 degrees colder in the room than the set temp. No help from tech support. A hard reset is all they could suggest. This is the most basic feature of an AC unit. Bad.
Always there when I need it. Works as described. It disconnect from internet on a regular basis until I upgraded my router.
Sailed through iOS setup, but Android a no go. Definitely needs work.
App stopped allowing turbo mode control.

Since the last update I don't have the option for TURBO and the AUTO for the swing does not activate the swing mode. Remote works well. Edit: I did contact the email below and they contacted me and helped me the same day. Excellent

I have a mini split 18k 3 gen and connected through the SmartHVAC. I can not stop the swing through the app. When the A.C. unit is turn on by the app the remote does not work. If these are cockpit errors on my part please let know and I will edit this review. I can adjust the temperature. I like the sliding dial. I can adjust the fan speed. Nice user interface. Update. Doing a sync remote seemed to have resolved my issues. How about a help adding a section in the app to explain the features?

* two different user accounts cannot share control of the same units. If you create an account and configure your AC to connect with the app on that phone, then your partner opens their phone to create an account and connect as well, the AC units will not appear in the wireless list for access through both phones. * If you log in using Google/Facebook/apple you cannot reset your account password. And there's no way to delete an account. So you only get one shot at correct setup
Excellent, very easy to use. It does drop from internet on a regular basis until I upgraded my router. I have it at a vocation rental and it is great tool to have when guests are breaking the rules.
Great app! The interface is same like Cielo Home. I wonder why both apps have same functionality. However, well design and very useful.

New update to app is truly excellent, offers much more data about my AC unit. Superb also has a tracker of heating, cooling, humidity and outside temperature so you can follow how your house heating and cooling is working.
The mini split units themselves are hit-or-miss in how well they work, but the app itself works great.
Not Syncing together

Worked great for around four months until the app updated. Now it will now connect to my unit and it is basically worthless without the ability to control remotely. I was considering buying a second one until this happened. Buyer beware of faulty app
Has potential but swing function doesn't work and were is the Turbo feature, lot of remote features are missing
This is just an older version of Cielo Home rebranded as Mr Cool.
The app setup took moments. You can setup schedules and temperature triggers so if it gets above or below certain levels the unit will adjust itself.
I love this app. Really helpful!
This is a great app, with great support behind it. Highly reccommend
Works good so far - Pixel 3 XL and MrCool Olympus 24k Mini-Split

Very misleading on having a big advertisement about this great app on the box when it will only work at home when u can sit and reset it all the time. I bought a 2300$ 36k unit and this app will not work away from home!! U all know its BS im sure! Its 2020 come on it shouldn't be that difficult! I don't want my fan on the unit running 24/7!! Why won't the dang thing just completely cut off on its on when in auto. I would have never bought this if I knew this! Way to rip the American people off
Never work

Overall nice app, have only used it for one day. I would like to know why I am not receiving push notifications on my galaxy s10. I have notifications in the mr cool app set to on and I have them enabled through the galaxy s10 notifications settings.
App works awesome on Note 10.
Doesn't Work No support so far tried calling # from previous review They don't answer.

App works, no visible way to add additional users on other phones, so the app appears to only allow one user to control the unit. When the app is installed on a different phone and user account created the app requires registration and connection to mrcool hvac access point rather than finding the hvac system on the connected internal home network. If the functionality were built out to in the app to search the connected network for the device, registration could be simple for adding additional users to the mrcool unit.

I've had this app on and connected to my AC since Wednesday, it is by far and away the worst app I have ever used, it cannot stay connected to my AC for any length of time, it maintains that my AC is offline and has been causing random changes to the settings anytime i attempt to use it. I'm baffled as to how anyone could market an app for their product that is so unreliable and frankly, in it's current state, useless.
Overall great. If you ever run into trouble just let them know. The customer service is excellent. Comfy feature is great. I would like more options like IFTTT support.

App does not update when temperature is changed at unit itself. It is buggy, unreliable and not user friendly. Also it cannot be installed on multiple phones with different users for the same door opener. You can tell Mr. Cool did not put much effort into this app. Clearly an after thought. They should put less money in internet advertising and more money into making products that work as advertised.

App wouldn't even connect at first, I left a negative review and was asked to contact customer service. In about 15 minutes of conversation the gentleman on the other end had this up and running. I'm glad I didn't boycott the app. It has some cool features. 3 days in with our new DIY mini furnace and am happy so far 👍

I like the app overall, but it is missing some functions. Is there a way you can update the app to have ALL of the functionality of the remote. I would like to turn on the "turbo" fan speed from the app but I must use the remote. Otherwise the app works as expected.

Usage needs to be fixed. Usage shows anytime the system is turned on. Even if not cooling/ heating. I have mine set to 73 degrees all summer. The system usage shows it runs 24 hours a day. But really only runs a couple hours total, on and off.

I had been using the app for quiet some time now and had put in a request for them to bring in the turbo mode already supported by my AC. Finally they listened and now I have it up and running through the app. It works great and does it's supposed to.

It works, mostly, but could be way better if the developer put just a little effort into it. It's a simple app so making it work correctly isn't that hard. Most Samsung updates break it (saying it's not connected to a working internet or something to that effect) and it has to be uninstalled & reinstalled. It's a great idea & addition to the mini split, but if you don't want to put in the slightest effort to increase stability, reliability, and compatibility then at least make it open source.

Unreliable. Won't hold desired temperature, keeps reverting to 62 degrees. Missing features found on remote control. I uninstalled it from Android phone, will rely on remote and watch for updated version
Too hard to set up, and loses the settings EVERY DAY, so it has to be set up again! Samsung Note 8.
So far it will not allow me to use turbo and actually took it away. I have turbo on the ac and on my controller but using app will not allow. Not happy with app update.
Latest update messed up the history. All Temps are bunched and can't read them. The previous vertical bars were clearer.
Geofencing menu not displaying the map on Android 10 on a pixel 3a.

Awesome App. Remote really not needed. Between App and voice control on my Google home I got it covered. One feature I would love to have in the App is to set a range like on my Central Thermostat... Set it off it drops below 65 turn on the heat and if it rises above 80 to turn on the A/C. This way my music instruments in that room will always be in the right range. But other than that it's great. Fast, responsive and very useful.
App is simple to use and provide intuitive interface.
Top notch support! Connection issue with app solved in a single day! App works as promised and they helped my get my Alexa set up as well.

Missing the "My Rules" section of the app. The description list "You can set intelligent temperature based triggers for your air conditioners by using the ‘Comfy’ feature under ‘My Rules’ section of the app.", however the eSaver section only lets you set schedules and is missing the button for "My Rules". Also will not set location. The map is blank. **Update 4/25/2020** Support was very responsive and helpful and was able to push a firmware update to include this missing feature.
An excellent accoumpaniment to the heating controller. The app works well, is well designed and reliable. Lots of features and easy to use.
Thanks for adding Comfy feature.
My unit is working great.

It is a good app in a pinch to start the heating or cooling before you get home. The one feature it doesn't have which stinks is the swing or direct feature. If you set swing on the remote the unit will always swing. If you set direct the unit will return to the last direct setting. The button on the app doesn't change it. Just the remote does.
I love the product and app. From the app I can switch the AC On/Off. I like the scedules, works well.
Love it. It works good.
Lacks many program features of remote. Most of the time reflects inaccurate room temperature. Very frustrating as an ineffective app to such simple feature requirements.
Need to sign up

Main screen boxes lock up. I have Uninstalled/reinstalled but it wants me to register. I have registered twice and now I'm out of email addresses! It says email already exists. I can now finally log in but it is still locked up. Wth! Now what?

The app works fine but could never get it to link with Google Home . It keeps saying that Linking to SmartHVAC failed . Tried uninstalling the app and google Home also but never links . It's the only smart app I use that I can't get to link to Google Home . EDITED: Talked with the tech at MrCool and he walked me through setting the unit up with Google Home. For some reason I had to link it using the Ceilo Home app but it works great now. Very nice and helpful tech support.
Mrcool and the gang good stuff.
The scheduler only gives you the ability for one change a day This is what would be The most Important function
I have installed these smart AC controllers in my vacation rental and I use the app to see all the usage statistics and make changes accordingly there and then remotely via mobile phone.

I wanted a way to remotely control my unit so I can adjust the temperature remotely before I go out to work in the garage so went on and bought the device. The app allows me to login with my Google profile, so this was not yet another username/password combo I needed to make. Once in, it was just a few quick steps to configure it to my AC unit. The app itself is very intuitive and has all the features I'd like to see, so far.

The app allows you to control the AC with your smart phone, the actions are as fast as using the AC’s remote. I love the fact that I can turn my AC on before coming home and make sure it's turned off when we're away.

MRCOOL SmartHVAC app has great features that actually work. My daughter always forgets to turn her AC off when she leaves home. I set up a location controls on her phone using the app, the AC now turns off automatically when she leaves. Problem solved!

No turbo button on this app and when I change the temperature or the swing mode it turns the turbo off on the wall unit so I can't turn it back on with the phone I have to use the remote also when you close the app out and reopen it changed the swing mode from swing to position 3
Almost perfect. Would love the option to put the unit in freeze protection mode from the app, seems like you can only do it from the remote.
I love the Home screen of the app. It lets me know the room tempeature of my room. I can control my AC with a simple tap.
MrCool app makes it super easy to manage all my ACs.
Good device and stable app. Love the scheduling feature they trigger the exact settings.
Worked pretty well now it force closes as soon as I open it.
This app let's me see the status of my air conditioners in one place . I can constantly check the temperature and humidity of all rooms within the house.
Excellent app, all controls are accessible from one screen. Whatever control you may find on the AC remote is replicated on the app.

Been using the app for the past two weeks, seems to work great. I have 8 heat pumps installed in a two floor building and have added these devices in a zone. Adding the devices in a zone was fairly easy and now I can control power On/Off for all my heat pumps with a single touch.
I just installed my MrCool and downloaded this app does not seem to control the swing settings of the louver! All other functions seem to work with the app. Has anyone else had this problem?
Easy to install..up and running for 3 weeks and no issues

Works ok once i got it setup. Asked for a password to my router which is set to open... My guess is it wont connect to a non secured router. Also i cant find anything... Anywhere that tells me what the different colored bars mean in my usage. Seems like the thing would be smart wnough to turn off once it reached it set temp instead of going changing to heat to heat the room back up. But i have no idea what the blue.. Green. Red colored bars mean... Update: contacted tech support. No response.

When i first installed worked fine for about a week Now it seems to have a mind of its own wont turn on when scheduled and have found the system running when it was supposed to be off This morning i was in the room when it was scheduled to turn on it beeped and nothing happened checked the app and even though was scheduled to turn on it showed off
Excellent Mr cool remote app. Always worked great saves money all the time when I forget to turn temp down before leaving for my office.
I can check it at any time. Just click the SmartHvac app and see what happening at home. Very useful app.
No words can explain my satisfaction of using this app. It is useful and make them work for you. I really love it.
Pretty good app. I wish you could program in an acceptable temperature range rather than one number.

Got a new AC for my garage which also act as my workshop. AC came with a smart kit. i simply followed the provided manual and setting up was super easy. Even i had hiccups with my Alexa but with this dongle, the setup was even better. The control screen is cool and easy to use. I am most impressed by the schedules and location controls feature. The best thing is that instead of simple on/off , one can always set the preferred temperature, swing and speed. Well, that is cool. It works great with Alexa. I was not able to test with Google home coz i do not have one. So far my rating is 5 star.

The wifi feature is nice. I set it up on my Android phone without issue, and it's great to be able to control the hvac from anywhere. I haven't tried the scheduling yet. The usage graph is incomprehensible and useless. It just shows that the units are on all the time. There is no key for the colors... and I suspect they are meaningless. Now if it were able to show energy used per unit time, that would be useful. So far, I have not figured out how to connect a second, my wife's, Android phone. I'll give it 4 stars for meeting it's basic functional requirement to control the hvac from wherever you are, and a clean easy interface.
I cant see the network 😭 i cannot see the hvac network at all and the ac is not working very sad will be telling others not to trust
Works great with my Mr Cool. Has never failed, not even once.

I have been using MRCOOL air conditioner for about couple of weeks along with their Wi-Fi controller and this app to control my AC. Everything works great. Here are some of my observations: Installation: Installation and configuration of the Wi-Fi device using SmartHVAC App was extremely simple. I just followed the steps they mentioned in their user manual and everything was up and running in less than five minutes... Good one! Remote Control: I can now control my AC irrespective of my location. Means I can control it from my office, from kitchen or wherever using my Samsung smartphone. A complete flexible system.... Love it! Scheduling: I really really love their scheduling feature. Would have never thought this will become possible for mini-split ACs too. Really Cool, MRCOOL... Alexa: Alexa integration was seamless and easy. I enjoy controlling my AC through Alexa. There are various other features too e.g. Geo-fencing, air filter status etc. which I have not used yet but hope they should also work the way other features are working. Superb tech effort!!!

Nice climate control app and dongle. This app is really good for the wi-fi dongle that comes with mrcool air conditioner. Really impressed with the overall system and will buy more. It is the best climate control that I have used so far. Fairly simple to install, synch and control the system.
Works awesome with my MRCOOL air conditioner.
A PLUS!!!
Works well and as advertisd with my diy mrcool unit.
Does not work
I keep on getting alerts on my phone that the AC has been turned on. Even though I am home and haven't touched it. So basically it turns on and off at will with this App.
Works well to control and monitor my unit remotely.

I ran it for two weeks, this morning at 9 It was supposed to switch my mccool to auto 80d from fan. I arrived at 10 to find the room at 86 with the heat blowing hard. I just pulled the USB drive, this program doesn't work, I've have been fighting it since install.
Awesome app. Easy to controll temp excellent👏👏👏
Superb! Like the ability to manage my system from anywhere.

I've been using this along with a two Mr Cool unit. For a few days now, it's brilliant. A well developed app and well made unit. But I do have 1 issue that I won't score down on, sometime schedule missed and this is very frustrated for me.

Everything works except for the scheduling. That did work until the last update, but since then it seems like there is a 20% chance of it actually turing the unit off or on. Hope this gets fixed soon.
Excellent, really happy with Mr Cool device. It does exactly what it promises to to!
Excellent app to.control my AC
Easy to use and the flexibility to be fully control and great especially when on holiday abroad.
great to use - like being able to control my MRCOOL AC remotely😀🤗
Quick, easy and the best way to maximize your comfort while saving some money.

temperature and on history stopped recording all of a sudden also the air set at 71 auto and woke up to see it is 66 in room. and still on.. this is all while its 80 outside so only explanation is the app.
Device setup was really user-friendly. Just took a couple of seconds and it was up and running. Interface is amazing. App works perfectly with my cooling system!!
Excellent air conditioner very cold. Works nicely.
Does exactly what I want it to do with no problems, quick respond and easy to use.
Working great with my Mr Cool.

The app will make changes to the settings and works as it should. Schedules is hit or miss sometimes it will turn the unit on or off, I have set to turn the unit on every day at the same time and off at the same time. I really wish the function the way it should.
Great app. I can give this five stars now, let's see how things go in the future?

App works really well for controlling my Mr Cool. I have only wish that I could set my location in the app for the weather feature, otherwise I can control everthing! Works at office or away, it's great!
Worked Initially - Doesn't Run Schedules. When I first setup the app it worked great, but now it never runs the schedules and the unit is runing all the time unless I manually power it off.

I just installed the Mr. Cool 24k and the app works perfectly on my Note 9. I hope in future updates they show power consumption, that would be a great feature. Also the fan position doesn't work with my Mr. Cool unit. I can hear it beep, but it never changes.

It will turn AC On/Off and adjust temperature and fan speed. However, fan speed is not synced with physical remote. Louver position control does nothing. Voice control extremely limited through Google assistant and not working through Amazon Alexa.
Great love it. I can turn On/Off and check room temperature when not at home.👏👏👏
Works brilliantly. Well laid out and easy to use.

little disappointed...app requires a password but I dont have a secured network (live in the country no need) so it saying I have to enter a password when there isnt one. I'm not giving a password just for air conditioning.
perfect
The app works well with my Mr cool unit. Easy to set up and use all the functions including schedules. The only problem I have is the swing function does not work with my unit.
The app is awesome that it allow me to control my Mr Cool air conditioner. Good help from Mr Cool.
Very reliable and easy to use. Just what I was looking for. Controlling my Mr cool air conditioner from app is such big help.
Work great, I can access from anywhere.

The unit has a strong wifi connection. my room is set to 70 and auto all day. it's a 70 degree day. the unit is fluctuating the room between 62 and 75. its tracking measures what it was set to not room temp which is wildly unhelpful. my MR cool diy worked much better before using this I just wanted to be able to schedule changes. not worth it so far. waste of money for the extra part.
It crashes, I had to create a whole new Google wifi mesh wifi network for it to work quickly.

my mrcool ac was never this easy to control with the traditional remotes that come. it was damaged and replacing it would cost me more so i got the option to get the ac replaced with the smart unit and i dont even need to keep the remote handy now.

nice app but has a weird quirk. the history shows that my system has running for 24 hours a day for several days st a time. I use it in my garage for only a couple hours at a time. I have verified each time that the unit has been turned off. why is it doing that?
when I login in this app,it crashed.making me upset.
works great with my mrcool diy where the first gen wouldn't. just don't see how to join with Alexa or Google.
